curriculum.title: Jesús Enmanuel Hernández González - Curriculum Vitae
curriculum.aboutMe: Full-stack web developer with over 5 years of experience, specializing in building modern, scalable solutions across various industries. Proficient in React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Next.js, TypeScript, C#, RESTful APIs and working in Agile/Scrum environments. Strong communication skills and adept at collaborating in dynamic startup settings.

digitalSecurity.degree: Junior in Digital Security and Data Protection

experience0.position: Full Stack Developer with React, Next.js & C#
experience0.responsibilities: <item>Built scalable web applications using Next.js, .NET Core, Microservices, and Azure across multiple concurrent projects</item><item>Refactored SQL scripts to Entity Framework Core and designed database schemas</item><item>Collaborated in Scrum team through sprint reviews, effort measurements, and retrospectives</item><item>Configured CI/CD pipelines and integrated third-party services</item><item>Led trainees on best practices and coding standards</item>
experience0.skills: Next.js, .NET Core, Azure, Entity Framework, Microservices, CI/CD

experience1.position: Full Stack Developer with React, Next.js & Node.js
experience1.responsibilities: <item>Designed and developed high-quality web interfaces and mobile applications</item><item>Successfully integrated data and processes from external providers</item><item>Demonstrated progress and achievements in functionality, usability, and performance to stakeholders</item>
experience1.skills: Next.js, React.js, Node.js, GraphQL, REST API, Tailwind CSS

experience2.responsibilities: <item>Created user interfaces based on UX team specifications</item><item>Implemented functionalities in Scrum team following user stories</item><item>Supported quality control and backend teams with testing and code reviews</item>

experience3.position: IT Technician and Web Developer with ReactJs & Next.js
experience3.responsibilities: <item>Developed modern website for organizational promotion</item><item>Taught computer science to elementary students</item><item>Provided technical support and equipment maintenance</item>
experience3.skills: React.js, Next.js, Windows, Linux, Hardware Support

experience4.position: Freelance | Frontend Developer with ReactJs and Next.js
experience4.responsibilities: <item>Developed attractive and functional web interfaces that offer an intuitive user experience</item><item>Contributed to the development of the existing dashboard by adding new features that improved the usability and efficiency of the platform</item><item>Ensured proper configuration and functioning of web applications in production environments, ensuring a seamless experience for end users</item>
experience4.skills: Next.js, User Interface Design, UIX, React.js, REST API, Redux.js, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, Web Development

curriculum.softSkills: <item>Analytical skills</item><item>Individual and team work</item><item>Ability to adapt</item>

meta.title: Jesús Hernández - Full Stack Developer
meta.description: Hi, I'm Jesús Hernández, a Full-Stack Web Developer in React.js | Next.js | React Native | HTML 5 | CSS3 | Typescript | Responsive Design | C# | Asp.net Core | Git | Azure | SCRUM | Agile Methodology
meta.keywords: Jesus Hernandez, Jesus, Hernandez, Full Stack Developer, Full Stack, Developer, Web Developer, Web, Developer, React.js, React, Next.js, Next, React Native, React Native, HTML 5, HTML, CSS3, CSS, Typescript, Typescript, Responsive Design, Responsive, Design, C#, C, Asp.net Core, Asp.net, Core, Git, Git, Azure, Azure, SCRUM, SCRUM, Agile Methodology, Agile, Methodology

heroMain.description: As a engineer, I use my technical expertise and skills to build and maintain high-quality software systems. My passion for technology drives me to constantly learn and grow, and I strive to create solutions that have a positive impact on the world.

info.title: About Me
info.description1: I am a technology enthusiast with 5 years of experience as a web developer. I studied computer engineering and also pursued self-learning, crafting beautiful and functional websites for diverse clients.
info.description2: As my experience expanded, I ventured into other areas of development, exploring the realms of mobile and backend development. This diversified skill set allowed me to embark on even more exciting and challenging projects.
info.description3: Throughout my career, my drive to learn and grow as a developer has been my guiding force. Constantly seeking new technologies and techniques to refine my craft is at the core of my philosophy. I am thrilled to uncover where my passion for technology will lead me in the future.
